backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with authorization, blob storage, state maps for profiles, appointments, products, orders, media, and publications, plus related data types and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing UI‑theme changes, affected files, components, and test IDs with high‑confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short textual summaries of many frontend React components, describing their functionality, visuals, and structural roles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file that loads the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, forced light theme, payment success/failure routing, and rendering all major site sections.
frontend/src/components/Biography.tsx: Biography section with parallax effects, glowing portrait presentation, dynamic overlays, and biography content loading.
frontend/src/components/Booking.tsx: Booking section enforcing member‑only access, showing consulting rate, login prompts, and membership navigation with visual effects.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Implements a sliding shopping cart drawer with item display, cart management, and Stripe checkout session creation.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Displays contact information fetched from the backend using styled cards with phone, email, and location details.
frontend/src/components/Credentials.tsx: Renders a credentials section showing diploma and portrait images with decorative styling.
frontend/src/components/DnsStatusChecker: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Provides a footer containing professional credentials text and a copyright notice with branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Defines a responsive header with navigation, scroll effects, and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Creates a hero section with layered parallax backgrounds and interactive mouse‑based motion effects.
frontend/src/components/Media.tsx: Displays training videos section, checks user access and authentication, and shows gated content with animated visuals.
frontend/src/components/Membership.tsx: Renders membership plans, checks membership and Stripe setup status, and provides subscription actions.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Shows a payment cancellation screen with options to return home or retry by scrolling to membership.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Displays payment success, refreshes membership data, and provides navigation to home or content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name, email, and optional phone, submitting via a saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/Publications.tsx: Fetches and lists publications with Amazon links and includes a PayPal payment portal section.
frontend/src/components/Store.tsx: Displays a list of hardcoded apparel items with order buttons and QR codes in a styled section.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for configuring Stripe by submitting a secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/SupportDonations: Renders donation options including Venmo and Cash App with styled cards and QR images.
frontend/src/components/TrainingVideos.t: Fetches and displays training videos and documents with loading states and external watch links.
frontend/src/components/VideoModal.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a video modal component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and mutate user profile data, content sections, access permissions, and media from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, OKLCH theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom glow/visual effect utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetUrl.ts: Generates URL‑encoded asset paths by encoding each filename segment under the /assets/ prefix.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, with support for hash-based routing and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, radii, and plugins while enabling class-based dark mode and custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Captures the project's current architecture, features, issues, and deployment constraints for the ICP-backed React application.
